summary: When the attempt to kill a professor goes wrong, a series of violent events are triggered which force a taxi driver to run for his life.
cast: Jung-woo Ha|Yoon-seok Kim|Jo Sung-ha|Cheol-min Lee|Seo-hyun Ahn|Seok-jeong Hwang|Man-sik Jeong|Hyeon-joo Kim|Hee-joon Lee|Yoo-Mi Lee|Gi-won Yang|Dong-Heon Yeom|Jae-hwa Kim
title: The Yellow Sea
